column1: Gogó da Ema was a famous palm tree with a crooked trunk roughly shaped like a curvilinear letter N. The tree fell on July 27

column3: and there is a beach named after the celebrated tree. The tree also appears in folkloric art and music throughout northeastern Brazil.
